Description: A unique identifier for the track on Spotify.
The title of the song.
The name of the artist(s) who performed the song.
The release year of the song.
A measure of how popular a track is, ranging from 0 to 100.
A URL pointing to the album artwork for the track.
The name of the album the track belongs to.
A confidence measure indicating whether the track is acoustic, ranging from -1.0 to 1.0.
A measure of how suitable a track is for dancing, ranging from -1.0 to +1.0.
The duration of the track in milliseconds.
A perceptual measure of intensity and activity, ranging from -1.0 to 1.0.
Predicts whether a track contains no vocal content, ranging from -1.0 to +1.0.
The key the track is in, represented as an integer (e.g., 0 = C, 1 = C#, etc.).
Detects the presence of an audience in the recording, ranging from -1.0 to +1.0.
The overall loudness of a track in decibels (dB).
Indicates the modality (major or minor) of a track (0 for minor, 1 for major).
A measure detecting the presence of spoken words in a track.
The overall estimated tempo of a track in beats per minute (BPM).
An estimated overall time signature of a track
A measure from -1.0 to 1.0 describing the musical positiveness conveyed by a track.
A URL to the Spotify track.
The detected language of the song's lyrics.
